publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6476 Patrick Harvie on behalf of the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee: Report on the Inquiry into Active Travel—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee’s 4th Report, 2010 (Session 3): Report on the Inquiry into Active Travel (SP Paper 413).
